Post.title: , svg
Post._content:
, , . svg, . , , .  
![](https://zhangxuekang.com/src/blog/mouse-svg/svg.png)
  svg, C, (c dx1 dy1, dx2 dy2, dx dy). *[(dx, dy), , (dx1, dy1), (dx2, dy2)](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/SVG/Tutorial/Paths#Curve_commands)*. , , .  
  , (*[](https://wenku.baidu.com/view/c790f8d46bec0975f565e211.html)*). .  
  data[]. 
```js
const data = [x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3, x4, y4, x5, y5, x6, y6, x7, y7, ...];
```
(x3, y3).
```js
/**
 * a
 */
// 
const dx1 = x3 + a(x4 - x2);
const dy1 = y3 + a(y4 - y2);
// 
const dx2 = x4 - a(x5 - x3);
const dy2 = y4 - a(y5 - y3);
```
. .  
:  
```js
function solve(data, k = 1) {
  const size = data.length
  const last = size - 4
  let path = `M${data[0]},${data[1]}`
  for (let i = 0; i < size - 2; i += 2) {
    const x0 = i ? data[i - 2] : data[0]
    const y0 = i ? data[i - 1] : data[1]
    const x1 = data[i + 0]
    const y1 = data[i + 1]
    // x2  y2 
    const x2 = data[i + 2]
    const y2 = data[i + 3]
    const x3 = i !== last ? data[i + 4] : x2
    const y3 = i !== last ? data[i + 5] : y2
    // 
    const cp1x = x1 + (x2 - x0) / 6 * k
    const cp1y = y1 + (y2 - y0) / 6 * k
    const cp2x = x2 - (x3 - x1) / 6 * k
    const cp2y = y2 - (y3 - y1) / 6 * k
    path += ` C${cp1x},${cp1y},${cp2x},${cp2y},${x2},${y2}`
  }

  return path
}
```
*[demo](https://zhangxuekang.com/mouse-svg/index.html)*

  , , . svg, . , , .  
![](https://zhangxuekang.com/src/blog/mouse-svg/svg.png)
  svg, C, (c dx1 dy1, dx2 dy2, dx dy). *[(dx, dy), , (dx1, dy1), (dx2, dy2)](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/SVG/Tutorial/Paths#Curve_commands)*. , , .  
  , (*[](https://wenku.baidu.com/view/c790f8d46bec0975f565e211.html)*). .  
  data[]. 
```js
const data = [x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3, x4, y4, x5, y5, x6, y6, x7, y7, ...];
```
(x3, y3).
```js
/**
 * a
 */
// 
const dx1 = x3 + a(x4 - x2);
const dy1 = y3 + a(y4 - y2);
// 
const dx2 = x4 - a(x5 - x3);
const dy2 = y4 - a(y5 - y3);
```
. .  
:  
```js
function solve(data, k = 1) {
  const size = data.length
  const last = size - 4
  let path = `M${data[0]},${data[1]}`
  for (let i = 0; i < size - 2; i += 2) {
    const x0 = i ? data[i - 2] : data[0]
    const y0 = i ? data[i - 1] : data[1]
    const x1 = data[i + 0]
    const y1 = data[i + 1]
    // x2  y2 
    const x2 = data[i + 2]
    const y2 = data[i + 3]
    const x3 = i !== last ? data[i + 4] : x2
    const y3 = i !== last ? data[i + 5] : y2
    // 
    const cp1x = x1 + (x2 - x0) / 6 * k
    const cp1y = y1 + (y2 - y0) / 6 * k
    const cp2x = x2 - (x3 - x1) / 6 * k
    const cp2y = y2 - (y3 - y1) / 6 * k
    path += ` C${cp1x},${cp1y},${cp2x},${cp2y},${x2},${y2}`
  }

  return path
}
```
*[demo](https://zhangxuekang.com/mouse-svg/index.html)*

U+0000~U+FFFF**U+010000~U+10FFFF**  
## 2. 
UTF-8UTF-16UTF-3248160U+389D = 0x0000 389DUTF-81134UTF-8UTF32UTF-8  
## 3. UTF-16 
UTF-16UTF-1624UTF-16UTF-324U+D800U+DBFFU+DC00U+DFFF4U+D800U+DBFF2U+D800~U+DBFF4U+DC00U+DFFF
>U+D800U+DBFFU+DC00U+DFFF  

UTF-164
```js
H = Math.floor((c - 0x10000) / 0x400) + 0xD800
L = (c - 0x10000) % 0x400 + 0xDC00
```

Post.title: javascript"==", ?
Post._content:
## 
  js, (implicit coercion), ()(explicit coercion).
```js
const a = 42
const b = a + "" // implicit coercion
const c = String( a ) // explicit coercion
```
"==", .
string, number or boolean. , (Object, Array, Function ...). ToString,ToNumber, ToBoolean, ToPrimitive.
### ToString
* 
  **null**: "null";
  **undefined**: "undefined";
  **true/false**: "true"/"false";
  **Number**: , 2"2", 0"0", 100"100". . 10, , , .
  ```js
  (0x23).toString() // "35"
  0x23 == "35" // true
  ```
  , , .
  ```js
  (0.0000001).toString() // "1e-7"
  (1000000000000000000000).toString() // "1e+21"
  0.0000001 == "1e-7" // true
  ```
* 
  **Object**: toString(), Object.prototype.toString(). , "[object Object]". toString(), , .
  ```js
  const obj = {
    value: 42,
  }
  const obj42 = {
    value: 42,
    toString: () => {return "ultimate"}
  }
  obj == "[object Object]" // true
  obj42 == "ultimate" // true
  ```
  **Array**: Array""Object.prototype.toString(), toString",".
  ```js
  const arr = ['a','b','c','d','e','f']
  console.log(arr) // "a,b,c,d,e,f"
  // toString 
  Array.prototype.toString = function() {
    return this.split('-')
  }
  ['a','b','c','d','e','f'] == "a-b-c-d-e-f" // true
  ```
  **Function**: FunctionObject.prototype.toString(), toString.
  ```js
  (function(){var s = 2;return s}) == "function(){var s = 2;return s}"
  ```
### ToNumber
* 
  **null**: 0!;
  **undefined**: NaN;
  **true/false**: 1/0;
  **String**: Number()(), , NaN. 0x(0X)16, "0".
  ```js
  10 - null // 10
  isNaN(undefined) // true
  1 + true // 2
  2 - false // 2
  20 - "0xb" // 9
  20 - "013" // 7
  ```
  , , 10
  ```js
  "1e+10" == 10000000000 // true
  ```
* 
  ToPrimitive, , number, . ToPrimitivevalueOf(), , toString(). , TypeError.
  ```js
  const a = {
    valueOf: () => {return "1"}
  }
  10 - a // 9
  const b = {
    toString: () => {return "2"}
  }
  10 - b // 8
  const c = {
    valueOf: () => {return "3"}, // 
    toString: () => {return "4"},
  }
  10 - c // 7
  const d = {
    valueOf: () => {return {}}, // 
    toString: () => {return "5"}, // valueOf, toString
  }
  10 - d // 5
  const e = Object.create(null)
  10 - e // TypeError
  ```
### ToBoolean
  false
  *  undefined
  *  null
  *  false
  *  +0, -0, and NaN
  *  ""

  , true(, ). true(, )
  ```js
  !!new Boolean( false ) // true
  !!new Boolean( 0 ) // true
  ```
  , IE, :
  ```js
  if (document.all) { /* it's IE */ }
  ```
  , API. , , IEdocument.allfalsy, .
  ```js
  !!document.all // true IE11
  !!document.all // false IE11IE
  ```
## "==" VS. "==="

  *  NaN === NaN // false
  *  -0 === +0 // true

  If Type(x) is String and Type(y) is Number, return the result of the comparison ToNumber(x) == y.

  ###  null VS. undefined
  > If x is null and y is undefined, return true.
  If x is undefined and y is null, return true.

  nullundefined, true. , false.
  ```js
  const a = null
  const b = undefined
  a == b // true
  a == null	// true
  b == null	// true
  a == false // false

  b == ""	// false
  a == 0 // false
  b == 0 // false
  ```

  ### Objects VS. non-Objects

  ```js
  Object(10) == '10' // true
  ```
  , nullundefined, "", .

  ```js
  a == null // false
  const b = Object( undefined ) // {}
  b == undefined // false
  ```
## 
  ```js
  [] == ![] // true [] == false -> [] == 0 -> "" == 0 -> 0 == 0

  2 == [2] // true  2 == "2" -> 2 == 2

  "" == [null] // true  "" == "" (ps: String([null]) === ""; String(null) === "null")

  "0" == false // true "0" == 0 -> 0 == 0

  false == 0 // true 0 == 0

  false == "" // true 0 == "" -> 0 == 0

  false == [] // true 0 == [] -> 0 == "" -> 0 == 0

  "" == 0 // true 0 == 0

  "" == [] // true "" == ""

  0 == [] // true 0 == "" -> 0 == 0
  ```

"==", .
string, number or boolean. , (Object, Array, Function ...). ToString,ToNumber, ToBoolean, ToPrimitive.
### ToString
* 
  **null**: "null";
  **undefined**: "undefined";
  **true/false**: "true"/"false";
  **Number**: , 2"2", 0"0", 100"100". . 10, , , .
  ```js
  (0x23).toString() // "35"
  0x23 == "35" // true
  ```
  , , .
  ```js
  (0.0000001).toString() // "1e-7"
  (1000000000000000000000).toString() // "1e+21"
  0.0000001 == "1e-7" // true
  ```
* 
  **Object**: toString(), Object.prototype.toString(). , "[object Object]". toString(), , .
  ```js
  const obj = {
    value: 42,
  }
  const obj42 = {
    value: 42,
    toString: () => {return "ultimate"}
  }
  obj == "[object Object]" // true
  obj42 == "ultimate" // true
  ```
  **Array**: Array""Object.prototype.toString(), toString",".
  ```js
  const arr = ['a','b','c','d','e','f']
  console.log(arr) // "a,b,c,d,e,f"
  // toString 
  Array.prototype.toString = function() {
    return this.split('-')
  }
  ['a','b','c','d','e','f'] == "a-b-c-d-e-f" // true
  ```
  **Function**: FunctionObject.prototype.toString(), toString.
  ```js
  (function(){var s = 2;return s}) == "function(){var s = 2;return s}"
  ```
### ToNumber
* 
  **null**: 0!;
  **undefined**: NaN;
  **true/false**: 1/0;
  **String**: Number()(), , NaN. 0x(0X)16, "0".
  ```js
  10 - null // 10
  isNaN(undefined) // true
  1 + true // 2
  2 - false // 2
  20 - "0xb" // 9
  20 - "013" // 7
  ```
  , , 10
  ```js

  ```
* 
  ToPrimitive, , number, . ToPrimitivevalueOf(), , toString(). , TypeError.
  ```js

    valueOf: () => {return "1"}
  }

  }

  const c = {
    valueOf: () => {return "3"}, // 
    toString: () => {return "4"},
  }
  10 - c // 7
  const d = {
    valueOf: () => {return {}}, // 
    toString: () => {return "5"}, // valueOf, toString
  }
  10 - d // 5
  const e = Object.create(null)
  10 - e // TypeError
  ```
